name: Road to Vegas
summary: Go from rags to riches on the Road to Vegas! Start off in Blackpool in the UK and then as you conquer the local tables your journey to Vegas opens up in front of you. To make it all the way you'll have to master 27 games including poker, blackjack and roulette. Some require nerves of steel, others more than a slice of luck. The further you go the higher the stakes and the risk.
